sentence.text: Genes harboring the most significant mutations include homophilic cell adhesion via plasma membrane adhesion molecules, protein monoubiquitination, DCAF4L1, and VHL in sporadic HBs, and ZNF814, G2/M transition of mitotic cell cycle, acrosomal vesicle exocytosis, PNN, and MUC7 in familial HBs.

entity.text: homophilic cell adhesion via plasma membrane adhesion molecules
G2/M transition of mitotic cell cycle

sentence.text: Five genes, including OTOGL, PLCB4, SCEL, THSD4, and negative regulation of Wnt signaling pathway, have CNVs in the six patients with sporadic HBs, and three genes, including ABCA6, mRNA splicing, via spliceosome, and LAMA2, have CNVs in the five patients with familial HBs.

entity.text: negative regulation of Wnt signaling pathway
